data.name: Our Mother's house
data.detailed_description:
Our mother`s house is a survival, exploration, puzzle horror game with randomly generated events.
Try to survive the night and explore your mother`s childhood house.
Use different items that can be found through the house to help you survive.
Make sure that monster`s stay away by interacting with objects in your environments.
Pay attention to the different sounds in the house to prevent ghosts from appearing.
Hide from the monsters by closing doors behind you or hiding in closets.
Find and protect your sister by making her follow you or make her stay in safe places.
Use the mouse to look in mutliple directions.
1 year since our mother left us...
We never knew why she left and where she is now.
The night she left, I saw here walked outside the front door... She wasn`t herself. So I ran to dad to wake him up but it was to late.
I don`t know why but dad seems to think that he can find out why she left by going back to our mother`s childhood house...
So this is why I left all my life a Seattle and all my friends...

data.short_description: Our mother`s house is a survival, exploration, puzzle horror game with randomly generated events. Try to survive the night by using different items and exploring your mother`s childhood house. But be careful as many shadows and monster are lurking in the darkness...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.8Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800GT / ATI Radeon HD 4850
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660
  • Storage: 350 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
